Protocols/BitReader.html.name: BitReader
Protocols/BitReader.html.abstract: A type that contains functions for reading Data bit-by-bit and byte-by-byte.

Classes/LsbBitReader.html.name: LsbBitReader
Classes/LsbBitReader.html.abstract: A type that contains functions for reading Data bit-by-bit and byte-by-byte, assuming “LSB0” bit numbering scheme.

Classes/MsbBitReader.html.name: MsbBitReader
Classes/MsbBitReader.html.abstract: A type that contains functions for reading Data bit-by-bit and byte-by-byte, assuming “MSB0” bit numbering scheme.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: offset
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Offset to the byte in data which will be read next.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: isFinished
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: True, if offset points at any position after the last byte in data.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: bytesRead
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Amount of bytes that were already read.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: init(data:)
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Creates an instance for reading bytes from data.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: byte()
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads byte and returns it, advancing by one position.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: bytes(count:)
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads count bytes and returns them as an array of UInt8, advancing by count positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: int(fromBytes:)
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads fromBytes bytes and returns them as an Int number, advancing by fromBytes positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: uint64()
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads 8 bytes and returns them as a UInt64 number, advancing by 8 positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: uint64(fromBytes:)
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads fromBytes bytes and returns them as an UInt64 number, advancing by fromBytes positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: uint32()
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads 4 bytes and returns them as a UInt32 number, advancing by 4 positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: uint32(fromBytes:)
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads fromBytes bytes and returns them as an UInt32 number, advancing by fromBytes positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: uint16()
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads 2 bytes and returns them as a UInt16 number, advancing by 2 positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.name: uint16(fromBytes:)
Classes/ByteReader.html#/s:11BitByteData.abstract: Reads fromBytes bytes and returns them as an UInt16 number, advancing by fromBytes positions.

Classes/ByteReader.html.name: ByteReader
Classes/ByteReader.html.abstract: A type that contains functions for reading Data byte-by-byte.
